description:
***UPDATED JUNE 2016***

This course will show you step-by-step how create your own Facebook apps and how to use them to make a passive income.

The we show you how to scale up your business to make $1500+ a month per client* with very little work involved.

After you finish this training, you will be able to create your own custom Facebook tabs, also referred to as FB Apps. Most importantly, your can use those tabs to make a passive income month after month.

You can apply this method anywhere people use Facebook (which is most of the world). You don't need any coding or programming skills to make these custom Facebook apps.

We will teach you step by step how to create these and are solution to easy selling and then scaling your efforts and services.

Also, as a BONUS, we are including a free coupon for our $20Â digital marketing course on getting free traffic and exposure to all your sites. Plus, we are including training on how to install and properly optimize a WordPress website.

We also included out Training on Demand section where students can request new lecture topics for more in-depth understanding and applications.

This training is perfect for:

  • Marketers Who Realize The Power Of FB, But Don't Know Where To Start
  • Those Wanting To Expand Their Offerings & Begin With FB Apps/ Tabs
  • People Wanting A Passive Income Offering Offline Marketing Services
  • Any Business Wanting & Needing More Exposure On Facebook

This course includes:

  • Over-The-Shoulder, Easy-To-Follow Training
  • Supporting Files, PDFs & Tools
  • Private Facebook Support Group
  • Our Underground Marketing Weapons

In this course you will learn:

1. How to create your own customized, Facebook tab (app)

2. How to get people to pay you for your Facebook tab service

3. How to scale up your business so you make more money and do much less work (I'm revealing some of my trade secrets)

4. How to maximize brand exposure using a Facebook tab

5. How to install and set up a WordPress website (bonus training)

6. How to curate and syndicate viral content for more online exposure and traffic (bonus training)

Thank you again for considering our course and we look forward to seeing you on the inside!

The IM Rebels
-Brian Gray, Mark Tandan & Shane Farrell

* This will vary depending on your location and your efforts
title: How To Make Facebook Apps for a Passive Income
instructors: Brian Gray, Shane Farrell, Mark Tandan
